title: OnePass KYB Organization ID
description: Schema of a Verifiable Organization ID credential used in the OnePass Ecosystem

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the credential subject.

company_information.description: Verification of the existence of the company, its legal form, address, tax number, representation, shareholders (if applicable) and other attributes of the company.

legal_name.description: Legal name of the company the credential is issued to

registration_number.description: A unique identifier assigned by the national company registry.

euid.description: European Unique Identifier, for companies operating across multiple EU countries, this standardized identifier can be helpful.

vat_number.description: Tax number of the company the credential is issued to

legal_form.description: The company's structure (e.g., Limited Liability Company, Public Limited Company, Sole Proprietorship).

registration_authority.description: Identifies the entity maintaining the companyâ€™s official records (e.g., Companies House in the UK, Registro Mercantil in Spain).

registration_date.description: Date of incorporation, of the company the credential is issued to

registration_country.description: The country in which the company is legally registered.

registered_office_address.description: Registered office address of the company the credential is issued to

verificationStatus.description: Status of the verification (e.g., pending, complete)

verificationMethod.description: Method used for verification (e.g., document review)
